message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective on the value, but I can't let it go for less than $13,000. This is already a very competitive price.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $11,500?
Bob, you're clearly serious about this product and I want to find a way for us to agree. How about we split the difference and call it $12,250?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can we try $11,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet at this price.
